00001 #include <unittest++/UnitTest++.h>
00002 
00003 #include "lastfmlib/submissioninfocollection.h"
00004 
00005 #include <iostream>
00006 #include <stdexcept>
00007 
00008 using std::string;
00009 using std::logic_error;
00010 
00011 SUITE(SubmissionInfoCollectionTest)
00012 {
00013     TEST(TestgetPostData)
00014     {
00015         SubmissionInfo info1("The Artist1", "Trackname1", 100);
00016         info1.setAlbum("An Album1");
00017         info1.setTrackLength(1);
00018         info1.setTrackNr(1);
00019         info1.setSource(SubmissionInfo::UserChosen);
00020 
00021         SubmissionInfo info2("The Artist2", "Trackname2", 200);
00022         info2.setAlbum("An Album2");
00023         info2.setTrackLength(2);
00024         info2.setTrackNr(2);
00025         info2.setSource(SubmissionInfo::Unknown);
00026 
00027         SubmissionInfoCollection collection;
00028         collection.addInfo(info1);
00029         collection.addInfo(info2);
00030 
00031         string expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist1&t[0]=Trackname1&i[0]=100"
00032                           "&o[0]=P&r[0]=&l[0]=1&b[0]=An+Album1&n[0]=1&m[0]="
00033                           "&a[1]=The+Artist2&t[1]=Trackname2&i[1]=200"
00034                           "&o[1]=U&r[1]=&l[1]=2&b[1]=An+Album2&n[1]=2&m[1]=";
00035         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, collection.getPostData());
00036     }
00037 }
